name: Marc Coury
title: Founder
bio:
Founding partner of GoDragons, Marc Coury, is a highly experienced software developer, public speaker and events organiser. He enjoys finding and delivering solutions to complex problems in a fast paced environment.

At the 2019 Go conference (gophercon.co.uk) in London Marc delivered a workshop on TDD and BDD. Additionally, while studying for his PhD, he led the organisation of a scientific conference (Hermes2014.org) and spoke at many scientific conferences and outreach events.

In his spare time he enjoys cooking, yoga, swimming and meditation.

name: Dragos Iordachioaia
title: Founder
bio:
Dragos Iordachioaia has decided to co-found GoDragons out of a desire to build a truly sustainable business. He has been building commercial software for 10 years, during which he has acquired skills ranging from public speaking and 3D graphics design to marketing and retail.

His strength is distilling complex problems into simple solutions. Dragos also really enjoys sharing knowledge and training people, having done that in most of his roles.

His downtime is spent cycling, boxing and playing tennis, mixed with learning new languages.
